Notes.Text:
This update for libcroco fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-12825: Fixed recursion issue in block and any productions (bsc#1171685).

Vulnerabilities.Description: libcroco through 0.6.13 has excessive recursion in cr_parser_parse_any_core in cr-parser.c, leading to stack consumption.
